c74object.name: ears.fromdiffs~
c74object.digest: Reconstruct signal from sample or frame differences
c74object.description: Integrates differences between samples or spectral frames.

objarg.name: initials
objarg.description: Sets the initial sample or samples (one number per channel)

method.name: float
method.description: A number in the second inlet sets the initial value for the integration (also see list and symbol).

method.name: int
method.description: A number in the second inlet sets the initial value for the integration (also see list and symbol).

method.name: symbol/list/llll
method.description:
A list or llll in the first inlet is supposed to contain buffer names and will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).
A symbol in the second inlet is considered to be a buffer whose first sample is used to start the reconstruction. A list in the second inlet is considered to be a set of samples (one for each channel) to start the reconstruction (also see float).
